item.gobber2.gobber2_ore_end.line1: Для добычи требуется адская Gobber кирка
item.gobber2.gobber2_sword_nether.line1: Отлично подходит для получения черепов визер-скелетов
item.gobber2.gobber2_sword_sniper.line3: Shift + нажатие ПКМ, чтобы включить/выключить способность
item.gobber2.gobber2_paxel_stars.line3: Shift + нажатие ПКМ, чтобы включить/выключить способность
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor.line2: Шлем: Медленное кормление и водное дыхание
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor.line6: Бонус полного комплекта: Защита против отравления
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_nether.line2: Шлем: Умеренное кормление с насыщением, водное дыхание и поглощение сердец
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_nether.line2b: Шлем: Водное дыхание и поглощение сердец
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_nether.line3: Нагрудник: Защита против огня и отталкивания
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_nether.line6: Бонус полного комплекта: Защита против отравления и иссушения

item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_end.line1b: Шлем: Водное дыхание и поглощение сердец
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_end.line2: Нагрудник: Защита против огня и отталкивания
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_end.line5: Бонус полного комплекта: Защита против негативных эффектов
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_dragon.line1: Шлем: Быстрое кормление с насыщением, водное дыхание и поглощение сердец
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_dragon.line1b: Шлем: Водное дыхание и поглощение сердец
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_dragon.line2: Нагрудник: Защита против огня и отталкивания
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_dragon.line5: Бонус полного комплекта: Креативный полёт и защита против негативных эффектов
item.gobber2.gobber2_armor_dragon.line6: Бонус полного комплекта: Защита против негативных эффектов
item.gobber2.sneak_right_click: Присядьте и нажмите ПКМ, чтобы переключить включить/выключить
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_above.line1: Телепортирует Игрока на самый высокий безопасный блок прямо над ним
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_above.line3: Нажмите Shift + ПКМ, чтобы телепортироваться на самый нижний безопасный блок прямо под вами
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_above.line4: Будьте безопасны с низостью, вы можете уйти далеко под землю!
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_above.line5: Простите, это кольцо работает только в Верхнем мире
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_acceleration.l: Provides a boost in velocity while player is aloft
Velocity value in config is set too high
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_airwalking.lin: Provides the ability to walk on air
Right-click on air block to place a Gobber Glass block
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_ascent.line1: Provides the player 3 minutes of Levitation
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_ascent.line2: Right-click in offhand to use, press sneak to remove effect
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_ascent.line3: Use with Ring of Acceleration for faster traveling
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_ascent.line4: Provides No Fall Damage while held in main, off hand or enderchest
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_attraction.lin: A magnet that draws dropped items toward the player
Hold Sneak to temporarily disable attraction
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_blaze.line1: Kills nearby Blaze and drops a bounty of Blaze Rods
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_blink.line1: Teleports player to the location they are looking at
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_curing.line1: Provides curing of most negative potion effects
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_dismissal.line: Tosses mobs out of your way
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_enderchest.lin: Provides player access to their Enderchest
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_explorer.line1: Teleports the player to a random location.
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_farmer.line1: Works on many plants, crops, saplings, cane, gourds, and bamboo
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_farmer.line2: Hold down shift key to grow grass and flowers
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_haste.line1: Provide player with improved block breaking speed
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_husbandry.line: Causes animals in a 10 block radius to mate
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_miner.line1: Breaks most vanilla blocks around the player
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_miner.line2: Right-click to break blocks, no drops
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_miner.line3: Shift right-click to break blocks, with drops
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_miner.line4: Right-click to break blocks, with drops
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_miner.line5: Shift right-click to break blocks, no drops
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_phoenix.line1: Allows you to survive the flames, and come out stronger
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_pyro.line1: Causes hostile mobs to spontaneously combust
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_repair.line1: Slowly repairs damaged item in player inventory
item.gobber2.ring_return.line2: Must sleep in a bed first to set bed spawn
item.gobber2.ring_return.line3: Right-click and hold to return to bed location
item.gobber2.ring_return.line4: Only works for travel within the Overworld
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_stealth.line1: Allows the player to go undetected by hostile mobs
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_sunshine.line1: Brings back the sun during a rain storm
item.gobber2.ring_teleport.line8: Travel to the stored dimension and try again.
item.gobber2.ring_teleport.line9: Allows player to teleport to saved location on right-click
item.gobber2.ring_teleport.line11: Set: point at a block and sneak + right-click
item.gobber2.ring_teleport.line12: Clear: point in the air and sneak + right-click
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_void.line1: Teleports the player to the End
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_void.line3: Sneak right-click in the End to return to Overworld
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_void.line4: Sleep in a bed before using
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_void.line5: Did you forget to hold sneak before right-click?
item.gobber2.gobber2_ring_void.line6: This device cannot help you here
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_sniper.line1: Fires very precise arrows at high velocity
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_clearing.line: Breaks grass, tall grass, flowers, etc. around the player
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_harvest.line1: Harvest mature crops around the player
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_farmer.line1: Combines the Ring of the Farmer and the Staff of the Harvest
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_farmer.line4: Shift + right-click to grow tall grass and flowers on grass blocks
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_ensnarement.l: Captures and stores many mobs and animals
Does not work on Players or Boss mobs
item.gobber2.gobber2_staff_nature.line4: Sneak + right-click to convert vaniila glass to clear glass
Allows player to their step height
Right-click to display current step settings
Sneak + right-click to toggle through options
item.gobber2.gobber2_medallion_exp.line1: Gives More XP drops and loot when killing hostile mobs
item.gobber2.gobber2_medallion_exp.line3: Sneak + right-click to store xp, right-click to retrieve xp
item.gobber2.gobber2_medallion_conduit.l: Provides player with Conduit Power effect
item.gobber2.gobber2_medallion_dolphin.l: Provides player with Dolphin's Grace effect
item.gobber2.gobber2_medallion_hero.line: Provides player with Hero of the Village effect
Hero of the Village ability active: %s
